name: Hardwood Backgammon
description:
Play single player or online with Hardwood Backgammon.

Hardwood Backgammon captures the classic fun of this historic board game. Play alone or online with players from around the world.
• Easy to use interface
• Full match play + doubling cube
• Play online or even 2 player local for a real table top experience
• World class Neural Net Backgammon AI available
• Achievements

Hardwood Backgammon breathes new life into your favorite board game with excellent graphics and effects. Enjoy calming playing environments with ocean waves breaking in the distance. Enjoy achievement challenges that take the experience from just a single round of Backgammon to endless fun.

____________________
Hardwood Games Subscriptions are optional and available at a rate of 1 month for $4.99, 3 months for $14.99 or 1 year for $29.99. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will auto-renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your subscriptions can be managed from your iTunes account settings. Cancellation of subscriptions is not allowed. Our privacy policy may be viewed at http://www.hardwoodgames.com/about/privacy/ Our terms of service may be viewed at http://www.hardwoodgames.com/about/terms/
